description:
I'm really trying to confuse you guys.
This is his first movie being played after his second movie. Perfect sense!
If you remember from his second video (er..the first video that aired) I mentioned he was not looking quite as refined, and that I was holding off on playing his first video till a rainy day. Since it's March Madness, it's raining men this sweeps week!
I had a couple issues with this video (and I am sure you guys will write me about it). I didn't realize he had expected me to groom his hair, and it does need a little styling (but hey, he is a straight guy after all). He had gone a little crazy with the trimming shears and has that..uh..odd pubic manscaping. It will drive most of you crazy. His hands were a bit beat up too.
When I later reviewed the video, I noticed he smiled through the whole thing. At first I was thinking he wasn't taking it seriously, then after getting to know him better, I realized Sergei takes very little seriously, and was actually just having a great time, and a little incredulous that he was in some dude's bed!
But I have to state unequivocally that Sergei is one big slab of beef, with or without these petty critiques. He looks like a football athlete- the dude you would sneak peeks at in the locker room and wonder what his dick looks like hard.
And Sergei never fails to pump out an amazing amount of cum. All on queue. (I love it when they ask me if it's ok to cum - such a perve I have become!)
Anyway, hope you enjoy him as Sergei.'s video kicks of March Madness - Sweeps Week!
title: Sergei - Solo
